input.sentences: fund raising event to support helpless animals .
some of our fundraisers decided to dress in costumes for the event .
band members performed several songs for the crowd .
our drummer had some good skills playing the drums .
and our guitarist did an awesome job getting us all entertained .
output.sentences: There was support among the group to start raising money for the helpless.
The group dressed up in costumes and put on a fundraising event.
At the event, there were bands who performed songs for the crowd.
People enjoyed the musician who demonstrated his skills playing the drums.
Others were more partial to the guitarist who clearly enjoyed his job performing, and kept the crowd entertained.
